title: Dwars door Vlaanderen: Powless Stuns Van Aert after Visma Blows Up Flanders Primer in 3-Up Attack
content:
More questions for Visma-Lease a Bike after Powless outsprints Van Aert after hanging tough with three 'killer bees' in 55km attack.

Read the full article at Dwars door Vlaanderen: Powless Stuns Van Aert after Visma Blows Up Flanders Primer in 3-Up Attack on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
